title: Smart QR Codes - Android Wear
summary: Scan, Generate and Share QR Codes from your Android Wear watch!

descriptionHTML:
Smart QR Codes for Android Wear (formerly Smart Business Cards)

** New detect QR Codes in images stored on your phone **

Smart QR Codes is a QR Code Generator, QR Code Scanner and QR Code Viewer for your Android phone or tablet... with the ability to also view the QR Codes on your Android Wear watch.

Create the following types of QR Codes on your Android phone/tablet:

-- Contact Information
-- Email
-- Phone Number
-- Website/Url
-- Text
-- Calendar Event
-- Geo Location
-- Wifi Network

Smart QR Codes has a built in QR Code scanner, so you can save existing QR Codes by scanning them with your camera or detecting them in images stored on your phone.

All QR Codes you create, or scan and save, can be viewed on your Android Wear watch from the Smart QR Codes Android Wear app. QR Codes can be scanned from your watch using any QR Code scanning app.

Launch the Smart QR Codes app on your Android Wear watch by pressing the watch button on the Smart QR Codes home page.

Get notifications on your watch when a new QR Code has been added.

Easily show your contact details, your birthday party event details, or your website to your friends, colleagues or business associates, all from your wrist!

Share your QR Codes by Email, Facebook, Twitter and more!

Don't have an Android Wear watch? Well, you can still use Smart QR Codes to create, scan, view and share QR Codes on your Android phone or tablet.

Tap the QR Code on your phone or tablet to see a larger, easier to scan version.

Tap the QR Code on your Android Wear watch to see a summary of the contents.

Swipe left and right to switch between your QR Codes on your phone or tablet and on your Android Wear watch.

Smart QR Codes is designed for both square and round faced Android Wear watches.

Smart QR Codes requires the Camera permission for the Scan from Camera option, and the Read SD Card permission to detect QR Codes in images stored on your device. No other special permissions are required and there are no in-app purchases, all functionality is included.

If you have a Sony SmartWatch 1 or 2, check out Smart Business Card for SmartWatch: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chrishopkin.smartbusinesscard

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Smart-QR-Codes/569815946494712
comments: Works even without watch! Great app, at start it asks u to install watch app but u don't need to, just back out. Works on nexus 5 running marshmallow v6.0.1 but menus like encoding error control level and character encoding type are black font on black background so cannot view. Not Worth cash until Devs fix this.
recentChanges: - Now detect QR Codes in images on your phone
